author: wn.com
title: Former PKU student Youyou Tu among trio to Nobel Medicine Pr... [2015-10-05] (PKU - Peking ...
text: ( Source : PKU - Peking University ) Peking University, Oct. 5, 2015 : William Campbell , Satoshi Omura and Tu Youyou jointly won the 2015 Nobel Prize for medicine for their work against parasitic diseases, the award-giving body said on Monday.
